item.description:
Hi all,

We'll meet at the playground at Highland and Grove St in Somerville near Davis at 10:30 to stretch out and get psyched for this great road race! Maybe over to the Burren Afterwards.

Hope to see you there!

Jen
item.how_to_find_us: I'll figure out a meeting spot as we get closer to the race!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Somerville Jingle Bell 5k
